pullRequest.title: JBTM-3320 LRA forget calls for nested completed participants are not …
pullRequest.bodyText:
…repeated and do not close the LRA
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/JBTM-3320
!MAIN !TOMCAT !AS_TESTS !RTS !JACOCO !XTS !QA_JTA !QA_JTS_JACORB !QA_JTS_JDKORB !QA_JTS_OPENJDKORB !BLACKTIE !PERF LRA !NO_WIN !DB_TESTS !mysql !db2 !postgres !oracle

nodes.bodyText:
just two ideas

could be pending null or it could not be?
I would, personally and if I don't miss some detail, consider more readable the lamda style like pending.removeIf(record -> record.forget())

nodes.bodyText: Do we need to call runPostLRAActions();. Have you tested your changes with an AfterLRAListener registered with the nested LRA?
